name: Rules of Last Battle: FPS Sho
name_original: Rules of Last Battle: FPS Sho
description:
Show your expert action skills to demolish enemies in the battle field and take control of front row to fight from the winters war. Kill all the rival force with your world war ii killer shooter skills and enter into the enemy base without any fear.
Features:

Thrilling Action packed shooting survival game with the shooting
Amazing Sound Effects
Selection of weapons to combat against enemies
Easy and smooth controls to shoot
Realistic 3D graphics battleground
